data.name: plName.Help
data.value: Enter a name for the Document

data.name: plUrl.Help
data.value: Select the Url for the Document

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: Enter a description for the Document

data.name: plCategory.Help
data.value: Enter a category for the Document

data.name: plOwner.Help
data.value: Select the owner of the Document

data.name: plSortIndex.Help
data.value: Enter a sort index for the document. You can use sort index as a sort criteria in the module settings page.

data.name: SortIndex.Invalid
data.value: Sort index must be an integer.

data.name: msgFileDeleted.Text
data.value: The file that was selected for this document has been deleted.

data.name: msgFileSecurityWarning.Text
data.value: Warning: The security permissions for the selected file do not match this module's configured view roles. The module is configured to allow viewing by role(s) "[$ROLELIST]", but the file does not. For users who are not members of a role that can view the file, this document row will not be displayed. You can adjust security settings using the File Manager in the admin menu.

data.name: msgFileWarning.Text
data.value: Your file selection may not work for all users (see message above). Click 'Update anyway' to ignore the warning messages.

data.name: msgNoFileSelected.Text
data.value: Warning: No file has been selected.

data.name: plForceDownload.Help
data.value: If selected this will force the file to be downloaded by the client. Helpful to prevent documents from opening in the users' browser.

data.name: labelLinkAttributes.Help
data.value: Use this to define custom HTML attributes (e.g. microdata) for document link in the attr1;attr2="value" format.

data.name: labelUrlTracking.Help
data.value: Displays URL tracking (audit) data for this document.

data.name: labelCreatedDate.Help
data.value: Enter date and time of document creation or leave empty to select current date and time.

data.name: labelLastModifiedDate.Help
data.value: Enter date and time of last modification of the document. This value will be updated automatically when document link is changed. Leave empty to select current date and time.

data.name: CurrentFolder.Warning
data.value: Cannot set link to a file in the current folder, as there are no files in it.

data.name: labelStartDate.Help
data.value: Enter the date from current document should be published on the site.

data.name: labelEndDate.Help
data.value: Enter the date from current document should be removed from publication on the site.

data.name: Delete.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this document?

data.name: DeleteWithResource.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this document with the accociated resource (file or URL)? Note that resource will be deleted only if it's not referenced by other documents.
